'''Bathhouse Steward''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The bathhouse steward is in charge of catering to the clients and ensuring they have a good time while enjoying Ganor's establishment. He has quite the sense of humor too.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            = 
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* Allows you to bathe in the adra-infused waters for {{cp2|1000}} ({{cp2|900}} if you make him laugh with [Insight](/insight/) 4 and [Streetwise](/streetwise/) / [Diplomacy](/diplomacy/) 4, {{cp2|2000}} if you piss Ganor off). This gives you the [Adratic Glow](/statusEffectsDeadfireMiscBonuses/) boon (+1 empower pool, +1 casts with level 1 spells for wizards).
* [Aloth](/aloth/) has varying reactions to the bath, possibly affected by the PoE1 state selected during character creation. These reactions range from distaste due to bathing naked (considers it prideful) to enjoying it as a "worthy use of animancy".
}}
